Text: According to dvd-basen.dk and imdb.com there's no anamorphic widescreen DVD released in region 1 (NTSC mostly used in R1 and R2, Japan) as of this date yet. Only letterboxed versions. There're anamorphic releases in R2,Europe (i.e. PAL) though.

Sorry. My bad :) There's anamorphic widescreen release in R1 titled as Cube (Special Edition or Signature Series):

http://www.dvdtalk.com/reviews/read.php?ID=9277
http://www.dvdfile.com/software/review/dvd-video_6/cube_ss.html

But the question is if the one in this topic is widescreen or fullscreen? And if widescreen is it anamorphic or letterboxed?

Any subs on this...???


And witch ???

Who the hell releases a DVD that's not anamorphic widescreen? You might as well shoot yourself in the face. Jesus christ... and this is a Canadian film isn't it? or directed by a Canadian director or something like that.... go figure...

At least this one has a decent picture quality (I've been told) .. the PAL release is very dark 

thnx to the uploader and thnx to the seeds .. :D
uhm .. I didn't mean to say that it's dark because of the uploader .. the thanks was supposed to be on the next line ..

Next time, please include English subtitles for the hearing impaired. They are also good for people who don't have English as their first language. Subtitles take up hardly any extra space and they make for more seeders because the torrent is useful to more people.
